name: Matches Puzzle
shortDescription: A classic matchstick puzzle game where you move, add, or remove matches to form shapes and solve brain-teasing geometric challenges.
fullDescription:
Matches Puzzle is a modern take on the timeless matchstick puzzle concept. Your goal is simple yet challenging — move, add, or remove a limited number of matchsticks to complete specific shapes like squares or triangles.

Key Features:

  • Classic Puzzle Mechanics: Solve hundreds of logic-based puzzles by rearranging matchsticks to meet the target condition (e.g., 'Remove 3 matches to get 3 squares').
  • Strict Logical Rules: Every move counts — all matchsticks must form valid shapes with none left unused.
  • Multiple Level Packs: Progress through a wide variety of packs (e.g., Pack 1, Pack 2, etc.), each containing 20+ handcrafted puzzles.
  • Hint System: Use hints to get help when stuck, obtainable through rewarded ads or optional in-app purchases.
  • Colorful Visuals: Enjoy a clean, vibrant interface designed for relaxing and focused gameplay.

Matches Puzzle is perfect for players who love logic challenges and visual problem-solving — a smart and satisfying way to train your brain.
